system.unidentifiedDesc: The flask or vial holds a swirling and mysterious concoction inside.
system.description:
The user may stretch their body and all carried equipment into nearly any shape — flat, long, etc. — to a maximum length of 30 feet or a minimum thickness of 1 inch. Items carried cannot be used or dropped while stretched unless the user returns to normal form first. While stretched, the user cannot attack or cast spells, and takes half damage from blunt attacks.

he effect lasts for 1 round.
